commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: So this is a diner...

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: What's up, Shio-ti? You look tense.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Oh, I apologize. I actually have never set foot in a diner before.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Whaaat?! Really?!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: What sort of restaurants do you usually go to? Are they, like, fancy sushi restaurants, or where chefs cook on an iron grill right in front of you?

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: I hardly ever eat out. My mother cooks all of my meals for me.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Home-cooked meals are the best.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Do you ever stop by anywhere after school, then? I'd love to take you to that taiyaki shop that we all went to together, once.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: After school? Until now I have just gone straight home. I also have a limited allowance as well.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Your allowance... Is it, like, a million yen?

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: It's 3,000 yen per month.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Whoa, really?! That's the same as me! Aren't you super rich, though?

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: It's the truth. I would not lie about my allowance.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Also, though my household may be slightly better off than average, I don't contribute to our income at all.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I didn't know that. You're really relatable, Shioriko.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: I am the same as the rest of you. Please do not give me special treatment.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: We don't think you're lying.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Okay then. I really am just a regular high school student.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: *Giggle* Well, let's make your first time at a diner a memorable experience!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: It's a special occasion, so order anything you like! But, you'll have to pay for it yourself.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: It isn't your treat?

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Shioriko, here's a menu.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Oh my goodness, there are so many items. I'll have a tough time deciding what to order.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Why don't we order self-serve drinks for all of us first?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: All right. I'm gonna go get my drink!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: We came here today to bond more with you, Shioriko. Also, we wanted to give you this.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: What is it?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: We heard that you didn't know what song to write, so we all thought about what kind of song would suit you. I wrote down some ideas about the impressions I get from you.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: What?

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: I picked out some songs by artists who seem similar to you, Shioriko.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: I drew a picture of what you seem like to me.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: I recorded myself humming some melodies I came up with while thinking of you.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Oh, wow... You did all of this for me?

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: I have some ideas, too! In my head, Shioriko, the theme song of an enemy commander in this very famous movie would suit you. Do you know it?

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: The commander wears a mask that really makes him look like an antihero. Though he's the movie's antagonist, he's arguably even more popular than the main character!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Are you talking about that villain who has a laser sword?

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: That's the one! I brought the soundtrack with me. Please give it a listen, Shioriko!

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: This isn't quite what I had in mind.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Aw, really?! I thought it was perfect for you.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Now I am really curious about your mental image of me, Setsuna. I would certainly like to ask you more about it, but for now...

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: *Giggle* Thank you so much.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: All right, let's all give Shioriko the stuff we've brought for her. I hope this gives you some inspiration.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: I am very grateful. I will certainly use all of them to inspire me.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I'm baaack! This is my special Kasumin concoction...

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Wait, what?! You all gave Shioko your inspiration items already? No fair! I had something, too!

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Thank you, Kasumi.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I promise, mine is the most inspiring thing of the bunch! Also, here's a special beverage that I made just for you, Shioko!

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: For me? Let me try it.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Whaddaya think?

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: I-It's delicious! What is in it?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Heh heh. It's my special Kasumin blend of five yummy juices.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: I did not know you could make your own drinks here. Diners are impressive.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Uh, hello? You're supposed to be impressed by my ingenuity!
